TopicTitle: KSP Orbit Mechanic 1.2a: Optimize Your Orbits

Articles.Content:
is this compatible with v0.16 of KSP

KOM 1.2a doesn't run inside the game environment, so it's compatible with all versions of KSP. I haven't added Minmus data to the calculator yet, so in that sense it's not entirely 0.16 capable. Otherwise, you should be good to go.

As an aside, I will add Minmus data into the next update, which will be available after 0.17 is released. If I'm going to open up the code again, I want to wait for all of the new celestial bodies.
An update with all the new planets and moons ? That will be great to plan our new missions to boldly go where no Kerbal has gone before.
